fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Pastel Yellow is one of the brightest colors, symbolizing calmness and peacefulness. Pastel Yellow can calm a player, and make their night more peaceful, preventing them from visiting.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If a player performs their action without visiting, Pastel Yellow will still block them from visiting, but their action will succeed.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paint the Town into a rainbow!
